org.metasee.www

Class MetaSee

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metasee.www.MetaSee

  • public class MetaSee
extends Object
    the main entrance of MetaSee if parameters are provided, MetaSee will run on command line else the GUI of MetaSee will run
    Author:
    SongBaoxing, SongBaoxing V1.0

      • produceTree

        public static MetaSeeTree produceTree(String singleFileName,
                      String[] elseFile,
                      String[] multipleFileNames)
        built a tree structure in memory
        Parameters:
        singleFileName - if there is only one input file, this is the file name
        elseFile - to judge how many input file
        multipleFileNames - if there are more than one input file, this is the file name
        Returns:
        a tree structure
